forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies with some morning fog. High 13C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Morning fog, then mostly cloudy this afternoon. High 57F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with rain developing after midnight. Low 9C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies with periods of rain late. Low 49F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. High 14C. Winds SE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. 25 to 50mm of rain expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. High 57F. Winds SE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. 1 to 2 inches of rain expected.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Thunder possible. Low 9C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Thunder possible. Low 49F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Light rain early. Breaks of sun in the afternoon. High 13C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Light rain early. A mix of sun and clouds in the afternoon. High 56F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds from time to time. Low 8C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low 46F. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Intervals of clouds and sunshine in the morning with more clouds for later in the day. High 14C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly to mostly cloudy. High 58F. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to considerable cloudiness and fog after midnight. Low 6C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early, then becoming foggy and damp later at night. Low 43F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. High near 15C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. High around 60F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Foggy. Low 8C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Low clouds and fog. Low 46F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Foggy early, then partly cloudy later in the day. High 16C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Areas of fog early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 61F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear skies early will give way to low clouds and fog after midnight. Low 6C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear skies early will give way to low clouds and fog after midnight. Low 43F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 17C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 63F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. Low 7C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. Low near 45F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly sunny skies. High 17C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly sunny skies. High 63F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. Low 9C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies. Low 49F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. High 16C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. High 62F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early, becoming a steady rain late. Low near 10C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, becoming a steady rain late. Low 51F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the morning with some clearing in the afternoon. High near 15C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with mostly cloudy conditions later in the day. High 61F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy in the evening then periods of showers after midnight. Low 9C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies early with showers developing late. Low 49F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
